summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD FUSION HYBRID. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V046000 (AIR BAGS). SISK FAMILY FORD (565 OAK ST, FOREST CITY, NC 28043, (828) 245-1626) STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE DEALER DID NOT MENTION A LOANER VEHICLE OPTION. THE DEALER STATED THAT THE PART MAY BE AVAILABLE IN DECEMBER OF 2018. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
